summary: All three requirements (REQ-13, REQ-14, REQ-15) have been successfully implemented. The organization name has been updated from 'जन कल्याण संगठन' to 'जन कल्याण एकता संगठन' in the content file, the HTML title has been updated with the English transliteration 'Jan Kalyan Ekta Sangathan', and all romanized references have been updated across the codebase including comments, documentation, and code identifiers.
